name: everything until it's nothing

shapecode_0_g=0.000

shapecode_0_a2=0.000
shapecode_0_border_r=0.400
shapecode_0_border_g=0.500
shapecode_0_border_b=1.000
shapecode_0_border_a=0.100
shape_0_per_frame1=r = if(above(bass, 1.2), .6+.4*sin(time*1.234), .1*sin(time*1.234));
shape_0_per_frame2=g = if(above(bass, 1.2), .5*sin(time*1.345), .1*sin(time*1.345));
shape_0_per_frame3=b = if(above(bass, 1.2), .5*sin(time*1.456), .1*sin(time*1.456));
shape_0_per_frame4=border_a = .25*sin(time);
shape_0_per_frame5=
shape_0_per_frame6=ang = ang + .67*sin(time);
shape_0_per_frame7=rad = rad + bass*.1;
shape_0_per_frame8=
shape_0_per_frame9=frametest = equal(frame%2, 0);
shape_0_per_frame10=
shape_0_per_frame11=//x = if(frametest, x - .25*sin(time), x + .25*sin(time);
shape_0_per_frame12=x = x - .1*tan(time*3.14);
shape_0_per_frame13=y = y - .1*sin(time*3.14);
shape_0_per_frame14=x = if(frametest, x, 1-x);
shape_0_per_frame15=y = if(frametest, y, 1-y);
shape_0_per_frame16=r = if(frametest, r, b);
shape_0_per_frame17=b = if(frametest, b, g);
shape_0_per_frame18=
shape_0_per_frame19=monitor = frametest;
shapecode_1_enabled=1
shapecode_1_sides=4
shapecode_1_additive=1
shapecode_1_thickOutline=0
shapecode_1_textured=0
shapecode_1_num_inst=1
shapecode_1_x=0.500
shapecode_1_y=0.500
shapecode_1_rad=2.41456
shapecode_1_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_1_r=1.000
shapecode_1_g=0.000
shapecode_1_b=0.000
shapecode_1_a=1.000
shapecode_1_r2=0.000
shapecode_1_g2=0.000
shapecode_1_b2=0.000
shapecode_1_a2=0.000
shapecode_1_border_r=0.400
shapecode_1_border_g=0.500
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.100
shape_1_per_frame1=r = if(above(bass, 1.2), .3+.5*sin(time*2.234), 0);
shape_1_per_frame2=g = if(above(bass, 1.2), .3+.2*sin(time*2.345), 0);
shape_1_per_frame3=b = if(above(bass, 1.2), .3+2*sin(time*2.456), 0);
shape_1_per_frame4=border_a = .25*sin(time);
shape_1_per_frame5=
shape_1_per_frame6=ang = ang + .67*sin(time);
shape_1_per_frame7=rad = rad + bass*.1;
shape_1_per_frame8=
shape_1_per_frame9=frametest = equal(frame%2, 0);
shape_1_per_frame10=
shape_1_per_frame11=//x = if(frametest, x - .25*sin(time), x + .25*sin(time);
shape_1_per_frame12=x = x - .2*sin(time*2);
shape_1_per_frame13=y = y - .2*cos(time*2);
shape_1_per_frame14=x = if(frametest, x, 1-x);
shape_1_per_frame15=y = if(frametest, y, 1-y);
shape_1_per_frame16=r = if(frametest, r, b);
shape_1_per_frame17=b = if(frametest, b, g);
shape_1_per_frame18=
shape_1_per_frame19=monitor = frametest;
shapecode_2_enabled=1
shapecode_2_sides=30
shapecode_2_additive=1
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.500
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.44480
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_2_r=0.000
shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000
shapecode_2_r2=0.000
shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000
shapecode_2_a2=1.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.100
shape_2_per_frame1=r2 = if(above(bass, 1.2), 0.5*sin(time*1.523), 1);
shape_2_per_frame2=g2 = if(above(bass, 1.2), 0.5*sin(time*1.983), 1);
shape_2_per_frame3=b2 = if(above(bass, 1.2), 0.75+.5*sin(time*1.194), 1);
shape_2_per_frame4=rad = rad - .4*bass_att;
shape_2_per_frame5=
shape_2_per_frame6=x = x +.5*sin(time);
shape_2_per_frame7=y = y -.2*cos(time);
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.200*( 0.60*sin(0.933*time) + 0.40*sin(1.045*time) );
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.200*( 0.60*sin(0.900*time) + 0.40*sin(0.956*time) );
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.200*( 0.60*sin(0.910*time) + 0.40*sin(0.920*time) );
per_frame_4=zoom = zoom + 0.023*( 0.60*sin(0.339*time) + 0.40*sin(0.276*time) );
per_frame_5=rot = rot + 0.030*( 0.60*sin(0.381*time) + 0.40*sin(0.579*time) );
per_pixel_1=zoom=zoom+0.03*sin((x*2-1)*4+time*1.63)+0.03*sin((y*2-1)*3+time*1.37)-0.1*sin(rad*0.1+time*1.6);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{ret=GetPixel(uv);
warp_3=`float d=lum(abs(uv-uv_orig))*0.6+0.003;
warp_4=`float3 one,two,three,four,five;
warp_5=`float3 sex,drugs,rock,roll,bugs;
warp_6=`float3 maxx;
warp_7=`one=max(
warp_8=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x-d,uv.y-d))),
warp_9=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x-d,uv.y)))
warp_10=`);
warp_11=`two=max(
warp_12=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x-d,uv.y+d))),
warp_13=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x,uv.y-d)))
warp_14=`);
warp_15=`three=max(
warp_16=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x,uv.y))),
warp_17=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x,uv.y+d)))
warp_18=`);
warp_19=`four=max(
warp_20=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x+d,uv.y-d))),
warp_21=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x+d,uv.y)))
warp_22=`);
warp_23=`five=abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x+d,uv.y+d)));
warp_24=`sex=abs(one-ret);
warp_25=`drugs=abs(two-ret);
warp_26=`rock=abs(three-ret);
warp_27=`roll=abs(four-ret);
warp_28=`bugs=abs(five-ret);
warp_29=`maxx=max(one,max(two,max(three,max(four,five))));
warp_30=`maxx=saturate(maxx);
warp_31=`ret=maxx;
warp_32=`ret=(ret+GetPixel(uv+ret.xy*0.01)*0.8)/1.4;
warp_33=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float3 rets = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`    
comp_5=`    ret = 0;
comp_6=`    ret = lerp(ret*GetBlur1(uv), rets, rets.x);
comp_7=`    ret = lerp(ret*GetBlur1(uv), rets, rets.y);
comp_8=`    ret = lerp(ret*GetBlur1(uv), rets, rets.z);
comp_9=`    ret = lerp(pow(rets*.1,ret*5),pow(ret*.1,rets),GetBlur2(uv));
comp_10=`    ret *= 2.00; //gamma
comp_11=`    ret = ret*(1-ret)*4; //solarize
comp_12=`float2 cntr = float2(q13,q14); float sin = q11; float cos = q12; float scale = q15;
comp_13=`float2 uv_r = (uv-cntr)*aspect.xy;
comp_14=`       uv_r = scale*float2( cos*uv_r.x - sin*uv_r.y, sin*uv_r.x + cos*uv_r.y); // rotation
comp_15=`       uv_r = cntr + uv_r*aspect.zw;
comp_16=`       uv_r = 1.0 - abs( frac( uv_r * 0.5 ) * 2.0 - 1.0 ); // mirror
comp_17=`sin = q17; cos = q18; scale = q16;
comp_18=`float2 uv_rr = (uv_r-cntr);
comp_19=`       uv_rr = scale*float2( cos*uv_rr.x - sin*uv_rr.y, sin*uv_rr.x + cos*uv_rr.y); // counter-rotation
comp_20=`       uv_rr = cntr + (uv_rr);
comp_21=`float t = q22;
comp_22=`float2 c = ((uv_rr-0.5));
comp_23=`float1 ang_hq = atan2(c.x,c.y);
comp_24=`float2 spiral = float2(ang_hq*q21*1.5,0.666*log(length(c))-ang_hq*q21+t);
comp_25=`spiral = 0.5 + (0.5 - abs( frac( spiral * 0.5 ) * 2.0 - 1.0 ))*float2(0.96,1.02); // mirror
comp_26=`ret = GetPixel(saturate(ret-spiral));
comp_27=`}
